The only negative which is an easy fix is the dress runs very long - I will also have it tailored a bit in the waist if possible - I am 5ft 6 XL Ashley Stewart is my other go to and I wear a 14/16 there As I mentioned before, the dress is extremely long, but that’s an easy fix I also may be able to get it tailored in the waist just a little bit, but it’s not absolutely necessary  I have tolerated sun dresses from Amazon that didn’t fit correctly in the chest or were too short and the pockets fit weird  This dress arrived with vibrant colors as advertised - the neckline fits perfectly - the pockets are not high and extended The material is cool and free flowing without feeling cheap love this dress will order several more I wore it to church with a cover I’ve had for years that matched perfectly  The issue with Amazon is once I find a supplier and try to stick with that specific one / they seem to disappear and the subs are never the same  Love this dress / worth it finally!!
